channel.title: How do I add portals to other locations?
channel.description: Example: From Brimhaven portal to Falador park, because I don't want to put working teleports. Please post & Thanks. :)

item.title: How do I add portals to other locations?
item.dc:creator: @I_Metal_I I Metal I
item.description:
@I_Metal_I wrote:

case PORTALID: teleportToX = XCOORD; teleportToY = YCOORD; sendMessage("MESSAGE"); Break;

simple as that =]

~@~<>metal<>~@~

Read full topic
item.source: How do I add portals to other locations?

item.title: How do I add portals to other locations?
item.dc:creator: @kupo kupo
item.description:
@kupo wrote:

TestScape will work, pimpscape will work, it all works the tut works just try it more then once if at first you don’t succeed. Add the object and then find case -1, it should be stairs add your portal in the same format as the stairs, w/o anything about stairs just an X,Y, and heightLevel. Also I added it under case 1728, which is a working stairs ID so the case ID is the object ID and add in your tele stuff there as well I always do this as a failsafe so IDK which one works or not.

Read full topic
